Optimus is an Autobot, but he's only 16 feet tall. I have already talked to=
 Yanshosh. And if we wanna talk about bullsh*t then how about 40 bullets fl=
ying at Megatron's head? And not getting hit by one of them?

Cyberwolf, I =
never got that post. Sorry about ignoring it, but I looked through all of t=
he ones sent by you, and the only one that I could find was one where he fo=
llowed them into a cave, I don't remember them going into a cave.

::Optimu=
s Prime/Eclipse/Wolveritron/Ramus::

    Pain wracked his body. Magnus, his=
 brother, had died. (I know KSLawdogg, Magnus was not Prime's brother, but =
this is a different Magnus) "You can join me."

-- 
  From: kinger01030@... 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Wedne=
sday, January 31, 2001 4:21 PM
  Subject: Ancient rivalry-Optimus


  Magnu=
s lunged at Galvatron. His sword penetrated into the evil bots stomach. 
  =
"Now your mine!" 
  Galvattron gurled up mech fluid. He pulled up his hand =
and shot a energy 
  beam right threw Magnus's chest. Right through his spa=
rk. Magnus fell back. 
  The matrix had kept him from death. Galvatron look=
ed over him. He used his 
  tail and dug into the bots back. Crushing his s=
upport device(spine). He was 
  completly paralyzed. Galvatron looked at hi=
m. "Now you are finished. My hands 
  will flow with the blood of the right=
eous." He clawed his way through the 
  bots chest plate. Exposeing the mat=
rix of peace. Galvatron luched his hand 
  into the spark. Pulling in out. =
As he did Magnus said one final word. As his 
  eyes widened with horror he=
 screamed.... "OPTIMUS!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!" 
  Galvatron  put the spark=
 with his collection. Magnus's body lay lifless. The 
  final merge would n=
ow begin.

ww.
